00032 #define CTOR_IMPL_CSensor_indicator  \
00033 CSensor_indicator* CSensor_indicator::NewLC(ac_AppContext* aAppContext) \
00034 { \
00035   CSensor_indicator* obj = new (ELeave) CSensor_indicator(aAppContext); \
00036   CleanupStack::PushL(obj); \
00037   obj->ConstructL(); \
00038   return obj; \
00039 } \
00040  \
00041 CSensor_indicator* CSensor_indicator::NewL(ac_AppContext* aAppContext) \
00042 { \
00043   CSensor_indicator* obj = CSensor_indicator::NewLC(aAppContext); \
00044   CleanupStack::Pop(obj); \
00045   return obj; \
00046 } \
00047  \
00048 CSensor_indicator::CSensor_indicator(ac_AppContext* aAppContext) : CActive(EPriorityStandard), iAppContext(aAppContext), iIndicatorDes(iIndicator) \
00049 {CActiveScheduler::Add(this);}

00061   // this if already started.

00065   // this if already stopped.
